name: Music_4219.wav
caption: This is a hip-hop music piece. There is a male vocal rapping at the forefront while there are repetitions and ad-libs that can be heard in the background. An eerie sounding melodic pad is playing the melody. There is a strong bass. The rhythmic background is composed of a hip-hop electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is unnerving. This piece could be playing in a scene where criminal activities are occurring in a crime/noir movie taking place in a big city.
